speaker.name: Flo Pachinger
speaker.biography: Flo is a Developer Advocate at Cisco focusing on IoT, machine learning and network programmability. With a software and networking background he has been working since a couple of years on many IoT, ML and network automation projects. He is the most passionate about connecting things and getting information out of data in any way possible. In his current role, he is working on awesome showcases with Cisco and Open-Source technologies and providing learning content to the developer community.
